summary: SummaryJ.Cat Beauty Waterproof Makeup Remover, a high performance, cucumber infused that dissolves any stubborn waterproof makeup.
details: DetailsFeaturesInfused with cucumber to hydrate your skinGently removes heavy or waterproof eye and lip makeupItem 2526414How To UseShake well before use. Saturate cotton pad or cotton ball with remover to wipe away stubborn makeup. Apply the cotton over eye area several seconds, then wipe with downward strokes and lip area in a side to side motion. Repeat if necessary. Rinse with cool water.Precautions: Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.IngredientsAqua, Isohex Decanecyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Propylene Glycol Decyl Glucoside, Poloxamer 184, Sodium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Hamamelis Virginiana Leaf Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber)Juic, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Disodium Edta, Hydrolyzed Silk, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexyglycerin. May Contain: Ci 42090 (D&C Blue No. 1Ai).
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Saturate cotton pad or cotton ball with remover to wipe away stubborn makeup. Apply the cotton over eye area several seconds, then wipe with downward strokes and lip area in a side to side motion. Repeat if necessary. Rinse with cool water.Precautions: Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.
ingredients: Ethylhexyglycerin. May Contain: Ci 42090 (D&C Blue No. 1Ai)

reviews.headline: works but not worth it
reviews.comments: burns your eyes so much, and also noticed my eyelashes seem irritated and fall out for days after using

reviews.headline: works but not worth it
reviews.comments: burns your eyes so much, and also noticed my eyelashes seem irritated and fall out for days after using

reviews.headline: Perfect, Finally!
reviews.comments: Are used your primer and they're real mascara. These are usually impossible to takeoff when I use this make up remover I hold it over my eyes for about 20 seconds and it literally dissolves it away. Perfect. I have tried everything possible and did not think anything at this price rate would work. And yet it works better than all the expensive remover's. I'd buy it in bulk as I don't want to run out of it.

reviews.headline: meh
reviews.comments: i got it for my waterproof mascara, and it did nothing. It removed my other make up ok but the mascara took FOREVER to get off

reviews.headline: trash
reviews.comments: makes my eyes burn and also have noticed my lashes are literally falling out because of it

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: I use this all the time, it works great for heavy makeup. I wear a lot of eye primer and liquid eyeliner, and this dissolves it really quickly. It will smear all over your face, so I follow up with the Ordinary squalane cleanser.

reviews.headline: Works great
reviews.comments: Removes my eye makeup well, I just don't like the design of the bottle with the cap and the little plastic flap. Overall worth it though.

reviews.headline: Painful
reviews.comments: I've tried many different dual phased makeup remover and they all pretty much work the same. This is the only one I've used that BURNS the heck out of my eyes. Not sure if it's the fragrance or what. Do not recommend

reviews.headline: this stuff works amazing!!
reviews.comments: i love this! it removed better than most.  definitely will purchase again

reviews.headline: A Fine Makeup Remover!!
reviews.comments: I use this mainly to remove my eye makeup,  and it does a fine job.  It's a quality product.  It'll remove stubborn eye makeup without irritating my eyes or rubbing them raw. All at a good price! Give this a try today!

reviews.headline: Oh wow!
reviews.comments: I had low expectations but was really impressed. Felt gentle, didn't burn my eyes, light scent, worked on Covergirl waterproof mascara. It took my waterproof mascara off quicker and easier than any other makeup remover. I also love how cheap it is! Worth trying. I would buy again.

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I purchased this because I wanted to try something new. I have sensitive skin and wear waterproof mascara, so I decided to try is. It burned the skin around my eyes and my skin was red and inflamed for two days after. Will not be repurchasing.

reviews.headline: Works well
reviews.comments: It's a standard makeup remover. I don't wear much makeup, so it's great for me. It also smells amazing. I love the bottle!

reviews.headline: Exactly as described
reviews.comments: Tried this on a whim because of the price. I use waterproof mascara daily and need something with some oil to take it off. I usually have to soak a cotton pad, resulting in alot of product use, and have to hold it to my eye for 30 seconds or more. I didn't have to do either with this. Easily rubbed completely off without irritating my eyes. The cucumber scent is an added bonus. Wish this was inside of stores so I didn't have to reorder.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I love using this!! It's perfect to get off waterproof mascara and pretty gentle on the eyes.

reviews.headline: I like it, nothing special
reviews.comments: Love the bottle, smells great too.

faceoff_positive.comments: Are used your primer and they're real mascara. These are usually impossible to takeoff when I use this make up remover I hold it over my eyes for about 20 seconds and it literally dissolves it away. Perfect. I have tried everything possible and did not think anything at this price rate would work. And yet it works better than all the expensive remover's. I'd buy it in bulk as I don't want to run out of it.
